storyInfo: On the summit, Leto questions the Trilby Asher on why she's been approached, but puts him on alert instead. During their stalemate, Arctosz reaches the duo, and falls down a cliff with Leto. Degenbrecher arrives afterwards, and stops the Trilby Asher in his tracks.

attributes.content: Grab my hand.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Hrh—Hah!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Alright!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: We met on the train back there, but I never imagined you'd save my life here.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: How fortunate for you to be here to lend me a hand. Who knows how long I'd be stuck in here otherwise.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Thank you very, very much for your altruistic assistance, Madam Rosalind Tatyanovna Larina.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Well, wasn't much. Don't mention it.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: You definitely don't look like a local, so I'm guessing you're a tourist going up the mountain?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Precisely.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: So why didn't you follow the main road, instead of falling into a pitfall out here in the forest?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: What were you gonna do if I didn't happen to pass by?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I was merely attracted by the scenic view, and didn't expect to run into a trap like this in the snow.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: If you hadn't happened by... perhaps I would have stayed here for a while longer. I'd calm down first before figuring out a way to climb out myself.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: But now I see how fortunate I am.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Madam Larina, are you going to continue your journey up the mountain?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Huh? Yeah, I am.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: We could travel together for a while, if you wouldn't mind.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: I'd like to admire the view of Kjerag's mountains from the summit as well.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Sure.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I don't mind. Let's go.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: We still have a long way to the top.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: That was...
attributes.name: Kjerag Elder

attributes.content: Riley!
attributes.name: Kjerag Youth

attributes.content: I just checked our traps and saw a pitfall collapsed. Thought we caught something!
attributes.name: Kjerag Youth

attributes.content: But when I took a look, there was nothing inside. Guessing it might have escaped.
attributes.name: Kjerag Youth

attributes.content: Did you see the man who passed by earlier? Doesn't he look like the guy Turiels asked us to look out for?
attributes.name: Kjerag Elder

attributes.content: You mean the one Degenbrecher asked us to find?
attributes.name: Kjerag Youth

attributes.content: All dressed in black, pretentious looking, wearing a hat and hiding his face. No doubt about it!
attributes.name: Kjerag Elder

attributes.content: Come! Let's hurry back and tell Degenbrecher!
attributes.name: Kjerag Elder

attributes.content: Hey, uh... say, I still don't know your name.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Aren't you guys pretty particular about uh, introducing yourselves when you first meet?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: An oversight on my part.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: You may call me John Smith. Or anything you prefer.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: John...?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: The name John Smith...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: What do you think of it?
attributes.name: 'John Smith'

attributes.content: Sounds... right out of a spy movie I watched with the Doctor!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Yeah, that was definitely the name of the spy guy!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I remember he had a really pretty sidekick too, so John, you... Never mind, coming up to this make-out point all alone means you're definitely single.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: A fascinating coincidence.
attributes.name: 'John Smith'

attributes.content: Right?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Alright, let's get back on track. I figure we still have a while to go before the summit.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I heard it gets colder the higher you go, and it gets harder to breathe too.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: So, you tired yet? Need a break?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Please, don't worry about me.
attributes.name: 'John Smith'

attributes.content: Do you need to rest, Madam Larina?
attributes.name: 'John Smith'

attributes.content: Nah, I'm good.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: You've got some real stamina, huh, Mr. Spy?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: ...Haha.
attributes.name: 'John Smith'

attributes.content: Seems like you really deceived him.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I fabricated no lies, Degenbrecher.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: There's no slipping your average falsehoods by a Trilby Asher collecting information for his Duke.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But I'm fully aware that these types usually know 'suspicion' best.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: 'The heir to the Paleroche Clan has secretly returned to the country' is a reality he first discovered by himself, so he'll believe it.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: And will definitely be watching Rosalind Tatyanovna Larina.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Your guesses are always right.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: The girl's already on the mountain, and Ratatos has contacted Arctosz.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I hear tell the Trilby Asher is also on his way up.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: He's hiding from me.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: No matter.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Just make sure he remains focused on the girl.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: It's time for you to move as well.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Fine, I'll treat it as after-meal exercise.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: However, are you sure the Doctor won't mind you letting the Trilby Asher close to the girl?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: He's a spy, not an assassin. What he's after is information, not a life.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Is that how you plan to explain it to the Doctor?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: To the Doctor, I shall offer my—apologies.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You certainly owe them.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: How I act is unimportant. Rather, I'm more curious—
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Degenbrecher, you remember the Doctor?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Sharp's a good opponent. Stronger than most of those clumsy knights.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: There's no harm in noting down someone who has the respect of a warrior like that and can also make you suffer.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: You're curious about the Doctor?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You could put it that way.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Alright, the idle chatter stops here.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I'm going to work.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: URA—!!!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: We're finally here——!!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Hoo. We must have climbed a few hours?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I'm beat. No wonder everyone quits halfway. That was exhausting.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Though...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: The view up here is really pretty... isn't that Lake Silberneherze over there?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Hahaha, the Kjeragandr statue looks smaller than my thumb from up here!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Lake Silberneherze freezes over in the winter, and resembles a pure and clear gemstone when viewed from this peak.
attributes.name: 'John Smith'

attributes.content: As such, the locals here believe the lake is a precious stone bestowed by Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: 'John Smith'

attributes.content: Truly a view you can only see from such a height.
attributes.name: 'John Smith'

attributes.content: It does look like a gem.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Oh, you can even see the station over there!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Huh, there's actually plenty of railroads in Kjerag, but the trains all look like toys from here...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I wouldn't call this plenty for a country that's still developing.
attributes.name: 'John Smith'

attributes.content: It might seem like a lot, but that's because Lake Silberneherze and the Kjeragandr statue are here.
attributes.name: 'John Smith'

attributes.content: There might be more roads around Karlan currently, but the operating lines will all pass through and transfer here...
attributes.name: 'John Smith'

attributes.content: ...They will, won't they...?
attributes.name: 'John Smith'

attributes.content: Hey, John, you still with us? I need a favor?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Can you help me see if there are two trees growing into each other around here?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: They should be old, with intertwining branches, and they look pretty strange too!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: It would be my pleasure.
attributes.name: 'John Smith'

attributes.content: Appreciate it!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: You know, John.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Aren't you curious why I'm looking for those trees?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Or what I'm doing up here on the mountain?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I mulled it over... and decided to handle things the old fashioned way.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: What...?
attributes.name: 'John Smith'

attributes.content: 'Fess up, and don't move!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: What is the meaning of this, Madam Larina?
attributes.name: 'John Smith'

attributes.content: You're not supposed to say that line yet, I haven't even done anything to you.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Spit it out though. You've been following me for ages, just following. What are you after here?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I don't understand.
attributes.name: 'John Smith'

attributes.content: Quit playing dumb!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I don't remember telling you my name.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: This is a misunderstanding.
attributes.name: 'John Smith'

attributes.content: You know the Viscount Harold Craigavon and I have history together, and it was he who told me your name.
attributes.name: 'John Smith'

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: You think I'm stupid?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I never told him my full name either.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: And you managed to climb up the summit without taking a single break. There's no way you could have fallen into a simple hunter's trap!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Even if you did, you could have just climbed out.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Anna and the girls always tell me to think before I act, but I have to say, sometimes there's no use in thinking too much either.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: You are much more careful than I expected, Madam Larina.
attributes.name: 'John Smith'

attributes.content: So you admit it?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: John Smith is probably a fake name too, right? Maybe... you really are a spy?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: What if I said yes?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Then you'd be pretty bad at your job.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Cause even I could tell something was up.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Your accusation is absolutely correct.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: It's true. I have been quite careless, and life in Kjerag has made me so.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: I have considerable freedom here, and there aren't many who pose a threat to me.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Hah, look at you talk.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I'm warning you, you'd better behave. And don't move an inch.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: You're standing on the edge of a cliff, and there's nothing but snow under your feet.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I just have to stomp my feet to send you falling, and I can't promise I'll catch you if that happens.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Alright, Madam Larina. I'll come clean, yesterday...
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Victorian scum!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Arctosz is here! You stay away from her!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Whoa! Wh-Where did you come from?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Ah-ah-ah-ah, wait! Watch your footfalls, the snow—
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Wahh—!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: R-Rosalind!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Grab my—
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: It's somewhat funny, but Arctosz is clearly charging towards me—
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Could Rosalind really have come here for something?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: No matter. He's coming, and I can only jump.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: ...The Black Knight.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: All rested up?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Not yet.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: That's not good.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: You'll be less fun to fight.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Going straight into it?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Problem with that?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I'll get straight to my point too then.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: You convinced the Viscount that everything on the train was a misunderstanding. I was only half-convinced at the time.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: But now, I know that even the stately Black Knight tells lies.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: That only proves that you don't know me at all.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: There's still time to turn around and go down the mountain for a nice lunch.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I'm sorry, but I tend to throw myself fully into my work.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'
